entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain changing to 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
